text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ――Gorgeous vernal scenery. Spring is the season when the heroes yet to be seen are secretly sprouting.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Above all, this spring may be special. The Five Hegemons. Is it you who will jump out, or…

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Hey! It seems like "That Horse girl" will finally make her first appearance on today mock race!
The training ground was very crowded that day. A promising newcomer. Yes, that Horse girl is…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Burorororo! ! ! Twin Turbo, arrive! !

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Turbo is great! Turbo is strong! I won't lose to anyone in speed!! Bagyubagyu～n!!

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: No, not you!
Everyone retorted at the small horse girl who suddenly jumped out. And from behind…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hey hey everyone! I'm the great invincible Teio-sama!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I guess I'll lightly show my talent today.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Whoa, here she come! Tokai Teio…!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text: A child prodigy recognized by the student council president Symboli Rudolph… I wonder how she will run.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Tokai Teio……. hmmm～, I feel like I need to do something… In that case.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Hehen! It's okay! First I'll see how it goes. Turbo will be watching!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Then, all of you trainers, watch me, okay? Fufufu～n♪

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ahhhhhh, the one to watch is Turbo! Listen to me Teio! The one named Teio～～～!!!
While attention is focused on Tokai Teio, one person flailing about, I was a little worried about the little Horse girl. and then―

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oops……! I think I ran a little too slowly. But my leg is still warming up!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: The real thing starts here! Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: Oooohhhh!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Waaaaaaaaa, what was that!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Wow, amazing…… I know she is fast, but I didn't expect her to go that far.
Beside the horse girl who called herself Twin Turbo, there was another horse girl who seemed to be a freshman.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: W… Who?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ah, I'm a nice nature. You may not know it, but I'm on the same grade as Teio and you.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Even so, there are some who are exceptional, after all! It's a feast for the eyes, thanks for the sight. I'm just going to do my best in my own way…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Oooooooh!! Tokai!! Teio!!!!!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: You finally appeared! A lifelong rival that will make Turbo burn everything down!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ehhhhhh, rival you mean…!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I see, Teio is the sparkling protagonist type, and you are the hot-blooded rival type.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Teio!!! Fight with me right now!!! How about another race right now?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Eh, right now!? Maybe you're not a hot-blooded rival type, but the type that bites right away!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ah stop stop! Please calm down Turbo-san!!
Tokai Teio, a promising new star. But, that little horse girl, Twin Turbo, was completely unfazed.
――And a few days later.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Fufufufufu～n♪
On the wall in front of me… an arrow was sticking out. There was a piece of paper tied to the arrow. I opened it and looked inside――
"Challenge. I'll wait you in the park! ! From your lifelong rival"
I didn't know such a place existed. It might be a typo. However, since I received it, I can't just ignore it.
I tried to come, but no one was there. I can't do anything about it, so I borrowed a fishing rod, While fishing at the fishing pond in the park―

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: It's a duel, Teio! ! !
I caught a horse girl as fierce as a piranha.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Eh… it's not Teio? Ah, that's Turbo's letter…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Don't tell me she has been sidetracked and ambushed! Ugh～ turbo doesn't taste good!
Trying to biting me, being frightened… she make a lot of reaction. For now I try to explain the situation.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: I see, so Teio didn't notice Turbo's letter, and then trainer…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Trainer is that one right? The one who coaches and runs with you!
She doesn't seem to understand it very well. I try explain trainer job in detail.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ehhh～…… so you're going to give lecture? Turbo hate it! I don't like that kind of thing～!
The words that came back were almost like a conditioned reflex. I try to change the conversation topic.
choice_data_list: Do you want to fight Tokai Teio?
You want to fight Tokai Teio?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: That's right! Teio is Turbo's lifelong rival. Do you know why I want to win? Do you know why I wants to compete with her?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Because I want to win!
It was that simple. But that's the kind of horse girl she is. A carnivorous fish-like horse girl who instinctively finds a partner and challenges them.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: No buts! Turbo will win! I will show you I can win! That's why in the next mock race!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: This time I'll be competing with Teio, you can come and watch!
I promise to her. Her opponent is the top genius of her generation. I don't know how far she can go, but I want to see her struggle.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ah, you can come and watch, but promise me one thing!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: No lectures. Turbo hate it.
